code: class  Solution  {   public :   string  rearrangeString ( string  s ,  int  k )  {   const  int  n  =  s . length ();   string  ans ;   vector < int >  count ( 26 );     vector < int >  valid ( 26 );   for  ( const  char  c  :  s )   ++ count [ c  -  'a' ];   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  n ;  ++ i )  {   const  char  c  =  getBestLetter ( count ,  valid ,  i );   if  ( c  ==  '*' )   return  "" ;   ans  +=  c ;   -- count [ c  -  'a' ];   valid [ c  -  'a' ]  =  i  +  k ;   }   return  ans ;   }   private :     char  getBestLetter ( const  vector < int >&  count ,  const  vector < int >&  valid ,   int  index )  {   int  maxCount  =  -1 ;   char  bestLetter  =  '*' ;   for  ( char  c  =  'a' ;  c  <=  'z' ;  ++ c )   if  ( count [ c  -  'a' ]  >  0  &&  count [ c  -  'a' ]  >  maxCount  &&   index  >=  valid [ c  -  'a' ])  {   bestLetter  =  c ;   maxCount  =  count [ c  -  'a' ];   }   return  bestLetter ;   }  };
